actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Labor-Management Relations.

official_title: A bill to require the Bureau of Labor Statistics to collect and report unemployment and related statistics by congressional districts.

summary.text: Amends Federal law relating to the collection, collation, and reports of labor statistics to require the Bureau of Labor Statistics to collect and report unemployment and related statistics by congressional districts.

titles.title: A bill to require the Bureau of Labor Statistics to collect and report unemployment and related statistics by congressional districts.
